channel.title: SkAI Institute
channel.description: The SkAI Institute for AI in Astronomy

item.title: NSF and Simons Foundation to Sponsor National AI Institutes in Astronomy
item.description: The National Science Foundation (NSF) and the Simons Foundation Division of Mathematics and Physical Sciences have announced that they will jointly sponsor “up to two national AI research institutes in the astronomical sciences”, according to a solicitation posted by the Simons Foundation. See the full solicitation here for details.
